summary:
As freelance Engineer, I am interested in technical and/or product-innovation challenges. Every innovation needs an open mind to manage the process, independent of the innovation itself!
When I believe in a project, I won't give up easy, all problems can be solved! 
If not, it's not a problem but a fact!
One of my strengths is motivating people and make them believe in a common goal. It is always "what is in it for US?". 

I cherish my experiences in Public Administration, it gave me the opportunities to achieve goals in
the collaboration between different Authorities. And with succes....cost reductions up to 50% can be reached!

My comprehensive experiences and achievements in international networking are major:
I had the honour of giving presentations at several international seminars and expositions. Like 
2014 in Belgrad on wastewater-topics, 2015 Apa Expo in Bucharest at the WAREG on water-Governance and in 2014 i was nominated by the Topsector Water to represent the Netherlands on the  Water Exposition in Zhanjian (China).

During last 7 Years I formed a close network at Romanian Governments and Authorities, such as A.N.A.R. (Apele Romane), A.R.A. (Romanian Water Association).
Also I discuss (waste)waster policy with the Secretary of State of A.N.R.S.C. (National Regulatory Authority for Municipal Services) on regular basis.

Initiating, developing and implementing innovations triggers me.
In private projects, or as company consultant. 
Hydrogen Automotive, Sugar Beets Processing, Wastewater Treatment, Governance Structures, New Applications for existing Materials, creatieve structural designing, it does not matter, it is the "Way of Thinking" that counts.

Cont(r)act me and find out....I am interested in a challenging career shift

+31 654223534

1990-1994	Board Member & Chairman VVD (liberal party) Helden			
1994-1999	City Council Board Community Helden (from 1995 chairman)	

2009-2014	general board member Waterschap Peel en Maasvallei (water authority)
2009-2014	general board member Waterschapsbedrijf Limburg (governmental wastewater company)
- In 2009 I was appointed to the board of a Dutch regional Water-Authority and Wastewater Company by the Chamber of Commerce. After 1 year I accepted a chair in the Executive Board of both governmental organisations. This was a part-time function, alongside of my work as Engineer /Entrepeneur. In this public function I was responsible for Community-water and wastewater Treatment.
2010-2011	Initiator collaboration Municipalities and Waterboards (Water/ Wastewater Chain)			
2011-2014	member management collaboration Limburg Noord	
- In these postions, I was leader in the collaboration-process between different authorites.
  it resulted in a National Ranking as "Excellent progress" (Commission Karla Peijs)

2010-2010	Initiator BsGW (Common Tax office Communities and Waterboards)
- As a member of the workforce I co-initiated the establishment of this BsGW as a governmental company. Savings in Public Tax costs are realised uo to 25%

In 2014 the Governmental Company Verdygo bv was founded.
The 4 years before I was protagonist of setting up this company to stimulate Innovations in the wastewater sector.

Entrepeneurship and Management:
After my graduation at Technical University Eindhoven I became director of IngenieursburoP de Lange bv. During 20 years I managed  a team of 10-15 construction-design engineers in the company.
Alongside I was director of a company for Projectmanagement and a company to design and build canopies for fuelling stations (Dutch Canopy bv).
In 2008 i founded Construcoach Engineering srl in Romania (later Dutch Civil Design srl) where
